Title: US trade deficit swells to $918.4 bn in 2024: What will be Trump's next move?
Description: The high figures could attract renewed scrutiny under the new US administration, with Trump already threatening tariffs on major US partners over trade imbalances and other issues

Title: Netanyahu lauds Trump's plan to take over Gaza but his UN envoy says Palestinians shouldn't be forced out
Description: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu lauded Trump's Gaza take-over plan, calling it the 'first good idea' he has heard since the start of the Israel-Hamas war

Title: Now, South Korea blocks DeepSeek on govt computers over cybersecurity concerns
Description: South Korea's defence ministry has blocked access to the DeepSeek AI tool on military computers due to security concerns. This move adds South Korea to the growing list of countries and companies restricting access to the Chinese AI tool.

Title: Trump's 'own' Gaza bid: Aides knew Potus wanted to take over but had no written plan, says report
Description: Trump and his team had been discussing the idea for months and some of his advisors saw it as a negotiating ploy to give Israeli leaders more leverage over Hamas as they try to navigate a 'fragile' ceasefire deal

Title: Argentina: Milei bans gender-change treatments for minors, restricts housing transwomen in women's prisons
Description: Argentina's President Javier Milei has introduced measures banning gender change treatments and surgeries for minors, along with restrictions on placing trans women in women's prisons.

Title: Rubio says US will skip G20 summit due to South Africa's 'anti-American' agenda
Description: Rubio's announcement comes two days after US President Donald Trump lashed out at South Africa over land reforms aimed at redressing inequalities perpetrated during the apartheid era

Title: Planes collide at Seattle airport a week after a passenger aircraft, Army chopper crashed midair near DC
Description: A Japan Airlines plane and a Delta Air Lines plane collided on the ground in Seattle Airport on Wednesday. The incident occurred just a week after a deadly mid-air collision in Washington DC involving an American Airlines plane and a Military Hawk Helicopter.

Title: Trump signs executive order banning transgender athletes from women's sports
Description: US President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Wednesday banning transgender athletes from participating in women's sports. Trump also emphasised that he would Push the International Olympic Committee (IOC) to change its rules on transgender athletes before the 2028 Los Angeles Games.

Title: Sheikh Hasina's father's home vandalised, set on fire by Bangladesh protesters
Description: The incident took place just a day after Hasina delivered an online speech urging Awami League supporters to protest against the interim government led by Muhammad Yunus, according to a report

Title: French PM François Bayrou survives no-confidence vote amid budget controversy
Description: French PM François Bayrou survived a no-confidence vote on Wednesday after the far-right National Rally announced it would not seek to topple the government over its budget. Only 128 lawmakers supported the measure, significantly short of the 289 votes required for approval, according to a report

Title: South Africa's Ramaphosa speaks to Elon Musk over Trump's 'land confiscating' comment
Description: Earlier this week, POTUS said that his government would cut off all funding to South Africa over 'illegal land grabs' by the country's officials
